csr.dpe.fcr

Absolute Address:
Base Offset:
0x0
Size:
0x4
Source:
csr.rdl

Description

DPE Flow Control Register

Contents

Bits Identifier Access Reset Decoded Name
[31] pause rw 0x0 csr.dpe.fcr.pause
[30:1] - - - -
[0] idle r 0x0 csr.dpe.fcr.idle

Field Descriptions

pause - csr.dpe.fcr.pause

Pauses DPE

idle - csr.dpe.fcr.idle

Indicates that all stages of DPE have been succesfully paused
